type.name: Engine
type.summary: Provides methods that allow new objects be created.

method.name: CreateEffect
method.summary: Creates a new based on a Magic Effect with given magnitude, area and duration, which can be added to an .

method.name: CreateMaterial
method.summary: Creates a new with the specified item and the specified count.

method.name: CreateScript
method.summary: Creates a new with the specified script name.
